channel.title: Help my plz i cant run sources on windows 7
channel.description: Hello guys i need really helm i cant run sources on my new windows 7 computer ore compile i have jdk and java on my computer

item.title: Help my plz i cant run sources on windows 7

item.description:
@tman915 wrote:

when i do this i get a bunch of errors.
do i need to change something in my source?
i used the “run” code

item.source: Help my plz i cant run sources on windows 7

item.title: Help my plz i cant run sources on windows 7
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

alright i had this same problem, i use a autorestarter to run my server and to compile and run my client I made a custom runner that works on my 64 bit windows 7, if you have a 32 bit then remove the (x86)

[code]@echo off
color 0a
if exist “C:\Program Files (x86)\Java” (call :compile “C:\Program Files (x86)\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo Not another error… facepalm…
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

@echo off
color 0a
title VregScape Ultimate Client
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0
highmem members 32
pause[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Help my plz i cant run sources on windows 7
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

The main class is usally found in server.java.
It is the only class containing:

public static void main(java.lang.String args[])

It is the part that makes your server executable.

Read full topic

item.source: Help my plz i cant run sources on windows 7

item.title: Help my plz i cant run sources on windows 7
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Use this for a compiler:

@echo off javac *.java pause

And this to run your server (If your main class has a different name, change “server” to it):

@echo off java server pause

For those codes you’ll need to set your environmental variables. You can get help doing this by visiting these topics:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic

item.title: Help my plz i cant run sources on windows 7
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

[code]@echo off
@TITLE Nightfall Compiler
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)

pause
exit[/code]

That is my compiler, see if it works.

Read full topic
